price: 134. Diggah korosey sin Rabbi Qhiyaamâ mamut kee digaalak sin kah xagnisem Amaateleeh tamaatu waytam Raqmali, isin Yallak yassaqqe mara hinnitoonuuy usuk sin digaalele akeeral.
arabic: إِنَّ مَا تُوعَدُونَ لَأٓتٖۖ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna mā tūʿadūna laātin wamā antum bimuʿ'jizīna
